bibl.title: A Stylistic Commentary on Phanocles and Related Texts. (Classical and Byzantine Monographs. XIII.)
bibl.note: Aux pp. 123-165: texte, traduction et commentaire stylistique de P. Sorb. Inv. 2254 (= Pack2 1756) [= P. Brux. II, 22].
Alexander Katherina, A Stylistic Commentary on Phanocles and Related Texts. (Classical and Byzantine Monographs. XIII.)
